description: Common in coastal and arid regions; drains quickly but retains few nutrients.
Found in Western Kenya and parts of the Rift Valley; fertile and well-drained.
Present in areas like Mwea and Athi; retains water but can become waterlogged.
Located in highland areas; rich in minerals and organic matter.
Found in highland areas; rich in iron but may require pH management.
Located in river valleys; fertile and suitable for various crops.
